text.div:
NCH Patient Status Indicator Code

This variable is a recoded version of the discharge status code (variable called PTNTDSCHRGSTUSCD). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/nchptntstusind_cd

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-nch-ptnt-stus-ind-cd

name: NCH Patient Status Indicator Code
description: This variable is a recoded version of the discharge status code (variable called PTNT_DSCHRG_STUS_CD). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/nch_ptnt_stus_ind_cd
